reviews.review: one of the best, if not THE BEST, stories of all time, intuitive gameplay, challenging puzzles, brilliant co-op campaign. 10/10, community test chambers allow for replayability.

Игра Portal 2 очень интересная, и немного сложная. В этой игре есть 2 режима, это 1. Обычный Режим( Кампания ), и 2. Совместный Режим( с другом или с рандомным человеком ). В игре Интересный Сюжет и Разнообразный Геймплей. Графика в полне обычная, но на слабые ноутбуки от 12к руб. на низких настройках графики в Кампании ( 40-60 fps ), в Совместной Игре ( 25-40 fps ) и это Очень Играбельно. Лучше всего ждать Летней или Зимней Распродажи, когда скидка будет 75%, тоесть без скидки 259 руб. а со скидкой даже 80% (непомню) 51 руб.        Кароче ставьлю этой игре 10 порталов из 10!

Mladší bratříček, cooltovní hry Portal a absolutně úžasné provedení, které je mnohonásobně lepší než první díl! 

Příběh nám začíná v momentu, kdy se Chell vzbudí v testovací místnosti, která imituje pokoj motelu. Dojde k tomu, protože se začne komplex rozpadat. V tom jí objeví malé centrální jádro jménem Wheatley. Wheatley vám pomůže projít testovací místnosti a utéct, ale bohužel omylem aktivuje systém hlídací GLaDOS.

✔️ Úžasný level a game design,příběh ze skvělým zvratem. GLaDOS, je asi nejlepší herní záporák.

❌ Gametime je hrozně krátky, ale furt delší než v Portal.

9/10

2 часть шедевра от valve, в котором надо логически думать и размышлять.

Одна из тех игр от Valve, которую я могу рекомендовать к прохождению. И не просто так.
Первая часть чувствовалась как технодемка, хотя у неё был свой сюжет. Сиквел стал более полноценным. К тому-же, кроме одиночной игры присутствует кооперативный режим (в который я не играл, так как друзей, с которыми я бы поиграл нет) и камеры от сообщества, если вам не хватает вышеописанных режимов. 
Сюжет для такой игры хороший, да и персонажи стали интереснее (и русскмй дубляж радует).
Минусом я зачту то, что игра может наскучит в одиночнрй комании, хотя это субьективно. 
Как итог, Portal 2 - отличная игра, в которую даже и сейчас не стыдно сыграть.

[h1] A perfect game to play together with your non-gaming gf [/h1]
The game's so good, I don't know where to start.

First of all, the graphic aged so well for such an old game, it won't be much of a problem for your eyes to get into it in 2020.
The tutorial is fun and [b] veeery [/b] helpful even for someone who had never play first-person game before, so this is a perfect gateaway to introduce you/your SO into gaming (mainly with first-person genre).
It also has so many useful tools you hardly need to turn on your microphone. The puzzles in the co-op really need be solved together, so you gonna need to communicate with your partner.
You can't talk about Portal videogames without mentioning the sarcastic/moronic AIs, the cute little turrets, the companion boxes, and its narrative. The interactive storyline and the secret easter-eggs gives you a lot of things to find while wandering around the levels.  You also gonna love the tone shift from the cheerful co-op mode into the darker one in single player mode. It may not have the feeling of loneliness and solitude as in the first game, but it still stay faithful to the original. It provides the backstory you need of what happened before the facility gone to shit like that.

[h1] No, you don't need to play the first instalment to enjoy it [/h1]
The game provides enough contents to experience you won't have a hard time to understand the lore, but playing the first game does help you get to know the characters and why are you in that situation. It's also has a lot of new things so you won't get bored with the types of puzzles even if you already finish the first game.

[b] All in all, I'm gonna rate it 9/10. I would recommend buying this game whether it's on sale or not, it's really worth the money.  This is the kind of sequel we can't help but to love and cherish. [/b]
I'm a bit confused whether or not I wanted another sequel, the game just end so perfectly you don't want anything bad happened to the storyline.

potato

Probably the best made puzzle game I've played. They really refined the formula from the first game and figured out how to make basically a AAA puzzle title which I don't think I've ever heard of before. The story is fun and interesting, the environments are well designed, the puzzles are challenging without making you give up. At least for me, I found the balance to be perfect. There were a couple parts I got stuck on for a bit, but I never wanted to look it up online, and I never had to. There is enough variety to keep you guessing too. Also I found the puzzles to be very well designed, sometimes they make you really think outside the box and make a puzzle out of something that just seems like chaos at first glance. Now I just need to find someone to play coop with because it looks like there is a good amount of content for that, and the possibilities are definitely expanded with two players. I'd probably give it a 9/10. Lots of fun and very satisfying to solve the puzzles.
